info.title: ForumLite API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for the ForumLite application, providing endpoints for managing users, posts, and comments.

post.description: Creates a new user account and returns the user data along with an API token.
Logs in a user and returns the user data along with an API token.

post.summary: Log out the current authenticated user
post.description: Invalidates the current user's API token.

get.summary: List comments for a specific post
get.description: Returns a paginated list of comments for a given post.

post.summary: Create a new comment on a post
post.description: Stores a new comment for a specific post.

parameters.name: post
parameters.description: ID of the post to comment on

put.description: Updates an existing comment by its ID.

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: ID of the comment to update

delete.description: Deletes a comment by its ID.

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: ID of the comment to delete

get.description: Returns a paginated list of posts. Can be filtered by a search term.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter posts by title or content

post.description: Stores a new post in the database.

get.description: Returns a single post by its ID.

parameters.name: post
parameters.description: ID of the post to retrieve

put.description: Updates an existing post by its ID.

parameters.name: post
parameters.description: ID of the post to update

requestBody.description: Post data to update. At least one field (title or content) is required.

403.description: Forbidden - User cannot update this post

delete.description: Deletes a post by its ID.

parameters.name: post
parameters.description: ID of the post to delete

403.description: Forbidden - User cannot delete this post

get.summary: Get posts of the authenticated user
get.description: Returns a paginated list of posts created by the currently authenticated user.

get.summary: Get comments of the authenticated user
get.description: Returns a paginated list of comments made by the currently authenticated user.
Returns a pong message to indicate the API is responsive.
